QuestData.Title: It's a Scourge Device
QuestData.Description: The Scourge creature you just destroyed had this device held in its clutches. It has a jewel set into it which looks similar to the one that tops the scourging crystals.$B$BSurely, Explorer Jaren would like to have a look at this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Scourge Device to Explorer Jaren on the Chillmere Coast.
QuestData.CompletionText: What an odd-looking device you have there, $c. Let me have a closer look at it.
QuestData.RewardText: I know what this is! $n, it's a controlling device for those scourging crystals!$B$BI bet anything that it can be used to shut down their force fields. Hmmm.$B$B<The explorer looks thoughtful as he ponders the implications of you having the device.>
